name: Snow Blast! Cathay Pacific Cargo 747-867F [B-LJL] Takeoff from Calgary Airport
description:
A 747 taking off after some freshly fallen snow is always an impressive, and "Cathay 095" on December 23rd was no exception! Here we have B-LJL departing 35R in a rare daylight departure after being delayed on the inbound route (HKG-ANC-JFK-YYC). Enjoy this crisp winter footage of the 747-8 Freighter clearing the snow off of Canada's longest runway. ATC is included!

Thanks for watching!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

FLIGHT INFO
Airline: Cathay Pacific Cargo (CPA/CX)
Aircraft: Boeing 747-8F (B748)
Aircraft Name: None
Livery: Old
Engines: 4x GEnx-2B67
Registration: B-LJL
Route: Calgary (YYC) - Anchorage (ANC)
Callsign: Cathay 095 heavy
Runway used: 35R
Date filmed: December 23, 2017
Local time: 1100
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/BLJL
